data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix gmelinii (Dahurian larch) from sample KAMENKLA-161

Exposition S, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Moräne Sand, Kies org. Aufl, Tree line 72 m, av. Tree height 10 m, Tree cover 20%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 30%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: LAGM-Wald mit Aluns frulicoso, Film number: 1011A
